name: Russian Jeep 4x4 Racing 3D
description:
Do you like to feel the power over tires of the Jeep SUV 4x4, and still Russian? Then Russian Jeep 4x4 Racing 3D - is for you! Dive into the world of 4x4 Russian SUV!

Feel like a real racer during the harsh Russian winter! A ride on the great Russian jeep UAZ and NIVA.

HOW TO PLAY:
Choosing a Russian jeep and go! Russian winter rider firmly holds the steering wheel, even when on the road strong ice! Next on winter road!

Main Features:
- Amazing 3D graphics and full of detail Russian cars
- Intuitive controls - Accelerometer or arrows
- Realistic physics of cars and drifting
- User-friendly interface
- Clever opponents
- Tuning Machines
- A large fleet of vehicles to choose from Russian jeep UAZ 3153, Patriot, 2131 Niva and others!

Want to feel like a real racer on the Russian winter jeep? So go ahead! Click on the gas behind the wheel of an SUV in the game Russian Jeep 4x4 Racing 3D!
